summary: This document is an email forwarding a New York Times article from September 16, 2019, regarding the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein. The article reports that officials stated Epstein was seen with girls exiting his jet the previous year, and it references the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY).

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the investigation; reported to have been seen with girls exiting his private jet.

events.title: Epstein Seen with Girls at Jet
events.description: Officials reported that Jeffrey Epstein was seen with girls exiting his private jet.

events.title: NYT Article Publication
events.description: The New York Times publishes an article detailing officials' statements about Epstein being seen with girls exiting his jet the previous year.

keyFacts: The document is an email forwarding a New York Times article dated September 16, 2019.
The article reports that officials stated Jeffrey Epstein was seen with girls exiting his private jet in the previous year (2018).
The email is addressed to or references the Chief Public Information Officer of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY).
